function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Testing MERS-CoV sensitivity to UV-C under strict containment BSL3 laboratory protocols","Impact":"Risk of accidental exposure to MERS-CoV during the testing process","Mitigation":"Strict adherence to BSL3 laboratory protocols and use of personal protective equipment","Technologies":"BSL3 laboratory containment facilities, UV-C disinfection systems","People":"Laboratory personnel, researchers","Owner":"Laboratory managers, biosafety officers"},{"Description":"Moist environment created by bleach-soaked pads preventing drying of virus onto glass coverslips","Impact":"Increased stability of MERS-CoV droplets on glass coverslips","Mitigation":"Use of alternative drying methods or surfaces for virus testing","Technologies":"Dehumidifiers, alternative disinfectants, non-absorbent surfaces","People":"Laboratory personnel, researchers","Owner":"Laboratory managers, biosafety officers"},{"Description":"Plaque counts indicating reduction of viral titers in the laboratory environment","Impact":"Risk of inaccurate assessment of viral titers leading to false conclusions","Mitigation":"Validation of plaque counting methods and use of multiple assessment techniques","Technologies":"Automated plaque counting systems, validation protocols","People":"Laboratory personnel, researchers","Owner":"Laboratory managers, quality assurance personnel"}]}
